name: Police Mayhem
description:
Police Mayhem (working title) is an arcadey game where you play as a police officer in a fictional Swedish location. I want to keep working on this, but I didn't have time to implement the theme-relevant part, which was that every 10 seconds, a new criminal commits a crime and tries to escape the island. You have to catch them and send them to jail. The most fun part right now is driving around and hitting trees and street lights. Probably works better in the desktop build. Also, sometimes car does SPOOKY FLOAT on HALLOOOWWEEEEEEEN!  OOO OoOoOOOOOOOoooooooOOoOOOOOOO.... Spooky! :fearful: Enjoy.

Controls:

Spacebar is gas pedal

A/D to steer

S to brake

CTRL+R to respawn
